name: Sis
description:
Sis is a 3D adventure and puzzle game for the PC, where you'll play the teenager Maze. You'll have to find your little sister Luna in a playground. To achieve this, you'll have to retrace Luna's steps, look for clues and solve puzzles.

Unfortunately the game is only available in German.

Features:
- ca. 45 Min. Playtime
- a toony playground to explore
- glimpses into a cute relationship between sisters and their lives
- a basic inventory with a handful of useful items like candy, a shovel and a hair clip

Controls:
Mouse - control camera
Left Mouse Button - select
WASD - move Character
press Shift - sprint

Credits:
A Game by Jana Lücking
Programming by Niklas Zink & Jana Lücking

Voice by
Irene Buckmeier as Maze
Jana Lücking as Luna

Sound Effects
Wind - Mark DiAngelo_http://soundbible.com/1810-Wind.html
Bienenflug02 - MArk646 _https://freesound.org/people/mark646/sounds/202251/

Animation by Mixamo
